statements: SELECT * FROM marketing_campaigns WHERE campaign_id = 1;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM marketing_campaigns WHERE budget > 10000;
SELECT target_audience, budget FROM marketing_campaigns WHERE conversion_rate < 0.05 ORDER BY conversion_rate DESC;
SELECT campaign_name, target_audience FROM marketing_campaigns WHERE start_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM marketing_campaigns ORDER BY budget DESC, conversion_rate ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM marketing_campaigns WHERE campaign_id = 1;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM marketing_campaigns WHERE budget > 5000 ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT campaign_name, target_audience, budget FROM marketing_campaigns WHERE conversion_rate > 1.5 AND start_date > '2022-06-01';
SELECT campaign_id, campaign_name, budget FROM marketing_campaigns WHERE target_audience LIKE '%young%' ORDER BY budget ASC, start_date DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_campaigns, SUM(budget) AS total_budget FROM marketing_campaigns WHERE end_date > '2023-01-01';
SELECT * FROM marketing_campaigns;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM marketing_campaigns;
SELECT campaign_name, region FROM marketing_campaigns WHERE success_rate > 0.5;
SELECT * FROM user_responses WHERE response_action = 'clicked';
SELECT campaign_name, response_action FROM marketing_campaigns JOIN user_responses ON marketing_campaigns.campaign_id = user_responses.campaign_id;
SELECT * FROM marketing_campaigns WHERE region = 'North America' ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT campaign_name, success_rate FROM marketing_campaigns WHERE success_rate > 0.8;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM marketing_campaigns WHERE region != 'Europe' AND success_rate < 0.5 ORDER BY success_rate ASC;
SELECT * FROM marketing_campaigns WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01' AND end_date <= '2022-12-31' ORDER BY campaign_id;
SELECT response_date, response_action FROM user_responses WHERE response_action = 'click' AND campaign_id IN (SELECT campaign_id FROM marketing_campaigns WHERE region = 'Asia');
SELECT * FROM Users;
SELECT user_name, email FROM Users WHERE date_registered >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT campaign_id, campaign_name FROM Campaigns ORDER BY campaign_id DESC;
SELECT user_name, email, date_registered FROM Users WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com%';
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM Campaigns WHERE start_date < '2022-06-01';
SELECT * FROM Campaigns
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM Campaigns
SELECT user_name, email FROM Users ORDER BY date_registered DESC
SELECT campaign_id, user_id, conversion_rate, revenue_generated FROM CampaignResults WHERE conversion_rate > 0.5
SELECT campaign_name, user_name, conversion_rate, revenue_generated FROM Campaigns INNER JOIN CampaignResults ON Campaigns.campaign_id = CampaignResults.campaign_id
SELECT * FROM Users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT name, email FROM Users WHERE signup_date >= '2021-01-01';
SELECT campaign_id, start_date, end_date FROM AB_Testing_Campaigns WHERE end_date <= '2022-01-01';
SELECT user_id, name, email, signup_date FROM Users ORDER BY signup_date DESC;
SELECT group_id, group_name, campaign_id FROM Experiment_Groups;
SELECT * FROM AB_Testing_Campaigns WHERE start_date < '2022-01-15' AND conversion_rate > 0.5 ORDER BY end_date DESC;

SELECT campaign_id, start_date, COUNT(*) AS total_users FROM AB_Testing_Campaigns JOIN Experiment_Groups ON AB_Testing_Campaigns.campaign_id = Experiment_Groups.campaign_id GROUP BY campaign_id, start_date;
SELECT Users.name, Users.email, Experiment_Groups.group_name FROM Users JOIN Experiment_Groups ON Users.user_id = Experiment_Groups.user_id ORDER BY Users.name;

SELECT campaign_id, COUNT(*) AS total_results FROM AB_Testing_Campaigns LEFT JOIN Campaign_Results ON AB_Testing_Campaigns.campaign_id = Campaign_Results.campaign_id GROUP BY campaign_id HAVING total_results > 10;

SELECT Campaign_Results.result_id, Users.name AS user_name, Campaign_Results.conversion_success FROM Users JOIN Experiment_Groups ON Users.user_id = Experiment_Groups.user_id JOIN Campaign_Results ON Experiment_Groups.group_id = Campaign_Results.group_id WHERE Users.signup_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM Campaigns;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM Campaigns WHERE id = 1;
SELECT user_name, email FROM Users ORDER BY user_name ASC;
SELECT group_name, description FROM TestGroups WHERE id > 3 ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT user_id, result, timestamp FROM TestResults WHERE group_id = 2 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM Users WHERE user_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM Campaigns WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT group_name, description FROM TestGroups ORDER BY group_id DESC;
SELECT user_name, email FROM Users WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com%';
SELECT campaign_name, revenue, conversion_rate FROM Campaigns INNER JOIN CampaignResults ON Campaigns.id = CampaignResults.campaign_id;
